Title: NumericBox WPF User Control Library
Description: The NumericBox WPF User Control is a simple numeric up/down control for WPF applications. It supports setting a min and max value, and it has the most essential events. Currently it's only working with integers. The User Control Library is developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The NumericBox WPF User Control is a simple numeric up/down control for WPF applications. It supports setting a min and max value, and it has the most essential events. Currently it's only working with integers. The User Control Library is developed in C#.
